Top in sturdy jersey with long sleeves and a second layer of jersey running from the shoulders down the sides of the sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lightly padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, a padded, pile-lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Flap side pockets with a concealed press-stud, an inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.

Opening with a button at the back of the neck, a concealed zip in one side and long sleeves with a frill trim and button at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped, lined skirt.
